item.description:
Hi there, we've mentioned that besides having our regular Tuesday monthly meetups at Dave's loft, we'll be expanding get-togethers at other venues and times. Folks who have asked for this, we've heard you. This is especially for you! ;o)

Please RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know for sure you can join us.
We're renting the space. We're providing light appetizers & refreshments. Also, limited to a smaller group.

**For directions, go to: http://www.togetherin...
( lots of FREE parking )

=============

If we really want to love, we must learn how to forgive.
- Mother Theresa


To have a truly THANKFUL, LOVING HEART, you must have a truly FORGIVING HEART. Forgiveness is not optional, it is absolutely essential to attract a happy life.

When there’s lingering blame, grudge, resentment and/or even haunting regret that makes it difficult for you to forgive yourself, ultimately you’re the one who pays the price most dearly over and over. You may bring your anger and bitterness into every relationship and new experience. Your life may be so wrapped up in the wrong that you can't enjoy the present. This definitely stutters the ease and grace of flow of joy and fulfillment into your life.

Hussein Alhadi, personal/ business coach and BostonLOA member, will facilitate a discussion to take action and embrace forgiveness in our lives. Learn some simple yet powerful exercises that will help you let go of the past, enjoy the present and create an empowering future.

Make the decision to heal, to embrace true forgiveness and more forward. Forgiveness is a gift you give to yourself. Your heart and soul thank you...in advance! ;o)

and yes…Come share what you’ve successfully done to have a forgiving and loving heart to open your heart’s doorway to attract more of what you want into your life.

Thank you very much, Hussein, for your gift of time, knowledge and facilitation at this meetup!


About Hussein Alhadi
husseincoach@yahoo.com
617-304-6162

Hussein is a personal & business coach and an enthusiastic student and "practice-ioner" of Law Of Attraction. He is also a Graduate of Sedona Training.


================

Do check our Message Board for info/ discussions from members. You're welcome to post LOA-related topics/ discussions there too.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Special BostonLOA Meetup this Wed, 11/19, 7 - 9 pm
